answers.answer: Hi there!I am not sure about her state/ country of residence and it would be difficult to direct you towards an organization. It might be a good idea to contact the social services department in her region or her doctor’s staff, since they might have a better idea about where to seek help.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: My niece is currently in the hospital just diagnosed with Juvenile Diabetes. Apparently my brothers insurance BCBS wont cover the insulin and they are needing medicine assistance. Can someone please direct me to an organization that WILL help this 9 yr old to supply her insulin??
title: Medicine assistance
